acf.about:
OFFICIAL DISTRIBUTOR SINCE 2015 

Milwaukee Tool is an industry-leading manufacturer of heavy-duty power tools, accessories and hand tools for professional users worldwide.
Since the company began in 1924, Milwaukee Tool has led the industry in both durability and performance. With an unwavering commitment to the trades, Milwaukee continues to lead with a focus on providing innovative, trade-specific solutions. Whether it is through their leadership in LITHIUM-ION technology, time-saving accessories or innovative hand tool products, Milwaukee is dedicated to delivering a steady stream of advanced solutions for the trades that offer increased productivity and unmatched durability.
acf.advantage:
• World’s best power tool manufacturer
  • 4000 employees
  • Annual revenue: 3.7 billion USD 
  • Milwaukee produces more than 600 tools and 4500 accessories which exceed that of any other power tool manufacturer 
  • Milwaukee Electric Tool has 28 firsts innovation in the world 
  • The Milwaukee V28 lithium-ion cordless tool system, was yet another new revolution in the power tool industry 
  • Milwaukee worldwide distribution: 100 гаруй улс орон

acf.about:
OFFICIAL DISTRIBUTOR SINCE 2013 

Burndy was founded in 1924 as Burndy Engineering Company in USA. Exceptional customer service, the industry’s highest quality products, and continuous innovation are the things that BURNDY® prides itself on providing. We have a wide range of tooling for all your connector needs and an electrical connector to meet every one of your power needs. With superior manufacturing technology, BURNDY® can create and build any custom connector for our valued customer with our advanced engineering support teams. With 95 years of dedicated customer support in both service and product, our customers need to look no further than BURNDY® for all their connector needs. In 2009, Burndy was acquired and became a subsidiary of Hubbell Incorporated.
acf.advantage:
• Best manufacturer of connectors, fittings in the world 
  • Non-stop operation over 95 years 
  • 3500 employees
  • Revenue: 400 million USD
  • TED Best of the Best 2009 Award 
  • Product category industry: 
    • Data & Communication
    • Electrical & Electronic
    • Power & Utilities 
  • Burndy worldwide distribution: 70 countries

acf.about:
EXCLUSIVE DISTRIBUTOR SINCE 2018 

Dialight is the world leader in LED industrial lighting technology. Our story began in 1938 in Brooklyn, NY, where we produced instrument panel lights for aircraft. We are providing one of the most efficient ways to drive down energy usage. Our next generation of lighting solutions not only reduce energy consumption but create a safer environment. Our products are specifically designed to provide superior operational performance, reliability and durability, reducing energy consumption and ongoing maintenance while achieving a rapid return on investment.
acf.advantage:
• Annual revenue: 170 million GBP
  • Largest industrial lighting market share 32% 
  • Over 2 million led fixtures installed worldwide 
  • Dialight has helped to reduce 1.1 billion kWh of energy consumption
  • 10 year warranty
  • Powerful lighting layout solution with two great tools
  • Work in extreme temperature -45C to +65C 
  • Dialight worldwide distribution: Over 100 countries

acf.about:
EXCLUSIVE DISTRIBUTOR SINCE 2017 

Sunlight Group is leading manufacturer of power distribution products to date, this distinction can only ignite Sunlight best in Singapore. Sunlight draws upon the latest technology and expertise of renowned brands such ABB, HAGER, Schneider Electric, Siemens, Mitsubishi, amongst many others, with one key focus in mind – To increase production and efficiency to meet and exceed customers’ needs and expectations and continue its spirit for innovation and improvement to product designs and testing standards.
acf.advantage:
• Partners with ABB, HAGER, Schneider, Siemens, Mitsubishi 
  • 15’500 square meter 3 facility 
  • Sunlight worldwide distribution: Singapore, Mongolia, China, Malaysia, Vietnam, Indonesia

Over a 65 year span, B&R has built a reputation for excellence in the design and manufacture of enclosures. Everything we have learned in that time, we’ve poured into our products and relationships. As an independent, Australian-owned business, B&R champions the virtues of quality, service and value. Combined with our unrivalled industry and application knowledge, we are in a unique position to meet the needs of our clients.

acf.about:
OFFICIAL DISTRIBUTOR SINCE 2017 

CHINT is a world renowned smart energy solution provider. Focusing on energy system of supply, storage, transmission, distribution and consumption, CHINT has core businesses of clean energy, energy distribution, big data and energy value-added services. Furthermore, CHINT pillar businesses include photovoltaic equipment, energy storage, power transmission & distribution, low- voltage apparatuses, intelligent terminals, software development and control automation. With developing into a platform enterprise, CHINT provides a package of energy solutions for public institutions, industrial & commercial users and end users, by building a regional smart energy operation ecosphere.
acf.advantage:
• 30’000 employees
  • 6 categories of 70 main line products 
  • Total subsidiaries: 16 
  • Total assets: 7 billion USD 
  • Annual sales of 11 billion USD in 2018 
  • Ranking top 50 Asian listed Companies 
  • Ranked 3rd largest of the top 100 private companies in China by Forbes 
  • Largest power transmission and distribution/controlling devices corporation in the country. 
  • Total 3600 product certificates 
  • CHINT worldwide distribution: Business network in over
  • 147 countries and regions
acf.additional:
Solution: 

  • Distributed PV
  • Off-Grid PV
  • Solar Street Light
  • Solar Pump
  • Smart Electric – Big Data, IoT based solutions

KRIPAL Electric Co., Ltd. founded in 1987 is specialized in circuit breaker, AC contactor, thermal overload relay, rotary switch, float switch, industrial plug socket, weather protected switchgear, solar inverter and others. Through the rapid development in last 30 years, KRIPAL act as one of biggest manufacturers in electrical industry in China.

EXCLUSIVE DISTRIBUTOR SINCE 2017 

IDE Electric, S.L. (IDE) is a company working in the electrical sector which manufactures and distributes plastic and metal enclosures for low voltage electricity distribution and for the telecommunication sector. IDE also manufactures plugs and sockets for industrial applications. Amongst the main targets of IDE it is remarkable the constant improvement in innovation and quality, and most .of the efforts are being made in this direction.

acf.about:
EXCLUSIVE DISTRIBUTOR SINCE 2012 

TELE-FONIKA Kable Group was established in 1992 as a result of the consolidation of several plants of the cable industry operating as long as since 1923 in Poland. The products produced in our plants are recognised by customers in more than 80 countries. Our range of products includes approx. 25 thousand types of cables and wires. We are a recognized and reliable provider of cables and wires made of copper, aluminium and fibre optics, used by the world’s leading companies in the power, telecommunications, electronic, shipbuilding and mining sectors.
acf.advantage:
• 3500 employees
  • Member of Europacable association
  • Total subisidiaries: 6
  • 25 thousand types of cables and wires 
  • 8 production plants, operates 500 production lines 
  • Standards confirmed with 380 quality certificates for its products, granted by 34 renowned certification centres in the world
  • 10,000 tonnes of cable waste per year as recycle fractions from certain materials at the purity level of over 99.5%. 
  • Total annual production output is over 220’000 tons of ready made cables 
  • Tele-Fonika worldwide distribution: More than 80 countries

AtThomas&Betts,wearecommittedtooperationalexcellenceandthe continual improvement of the health and safety of our employees, customers, and neighbors, as well as preserving the integrity of our environment. The Health, Safety, and Environmental management systems that are in place promotes prevention of illness and injury, compliance with legal and other requirements, as well as pollution prevention and waste minimization. The commitment is supported by senior management and is the responsibility of all Thomas & Betts employees. We will never “Look the Other Way”.

  • Thomas & Betts worldwide distribution: USA, Mongolia, European 18 countries, Middle Eastern 4 countries, Canada, Latin America, Asia Pacific 17 countries

acf.about:
OFFICIAL DISTRIBUTOR SINCE 2020 

Ryobi Group Limited is a Japanese manufacturer of components for the automobile, electronics, and telecommunications industries. It also sells printing equipment, power tools, and builders’ hardware. Ryobi Power Tools and Ryobi Outdoor Power Equipment are brands of Techtronic Industries. 

Ryobi® are dedicated to delivering outstanding performance and reliability, we’ve built a solid and enviable reputation by developing a real knowledge of exactly what people need from their power tools, so that you can work more efficiently, more safely and more comfortably in your home and garden.
acf.advantage:
• Ryobi group employees: 10’000
  • Annual revenue: 3 billion USD
  • Group companies: Total 22 companies 
  • Batteries come with built-in Intellicell individual cell monitoring technology that protects your battery from overload, overheating and deep discharge
  • 18V Home range 36V Garden range tools & equipment
  • 36V range runs quitter than traditional petrol motors, no smells, emission or pollution, 97% less vibration 
  • Ryobi worldwide distribution: Over 60 countries

acf.about:
EXCLUSIVE DISTRIBUTOR SINCE 2012 

For more than 160 years, Greenlee has been a provider of quality tools to the woodworking industry and, for over 70 years, to the electrical industry as well. Proof of that commitment is in the modern facilities, state-of-the-art production equipment, and enhanced quality assurance programs which comprise the Greenlee way of doing business today. Today Greenlee is the most respected and trusted source for professional grade tools when it comes to installing wire and cable.
acf.advantage:
• 2500 employees
  • Annual revenue: 500 million USD
  • Manufactures 63 types of 3500 tools 
  • Greenlee worldwide distribution: Over 100 countries

acf.about:
EXCLUSIVE AGENT SINCE 2011 

CCG commenced manufacturing cable glands in 1972 using the latest German Index machining technology at the time. The launch of the original Captive Component GlandTM was a direct response to a call by international mining companies that experienced problems with cable glands having loose components being incorrectly installed in deep level mines. 

From the beginning, CCG has placed emphasis on the users input to enhance design innovation. CCG’s policy of “built in safetyTM” and “designing out complexity” has meant that discerning engineers world-wide have recognized CCG’s products for their time and wastage saving features. The simplicity of the “Captive Component GlandTM” concept means that no matter where in the world CCG products are being installed, the simplest of instructions will ensure that all the parts have been correctly fitted. This concept is very important for installations and projects in developing countries where unskilled labour is very often used.
acf.advantage:
• Captive Component Gland
  • Innovative gland with just 2 parts 
  • The Most Innovative Product Award 2011
  • Best Explosion Proof Cable Gland of The HazardEx Awards 2007
  • 100% anti-corrosion 
  • Contracted global partners: Over 90 companies of 5 industry 
  • CCG worldwide distribution: South Africa, Hong Kong, Mongolia, Australia, Great Britain, South Korea, United Arab Emirates, Singapore

acf.about:
EXCLUSIVE AGENT SINCE 2008 

Baosheng Group was founded in 1985, affiliated with Aviation Industry Corporation of China (AVIC). The Group has been selected as National Key New-and High-tech Enterprise, Key Enterprise Group of Jiangsu Province, and continuously listed in Top 500 Asia Brands. As an incorporated company of Baosheng Group, Baosheng Science and Technology Innovation Co., Ltd., listed in Shanghai Stock Exchange in 2004 (SHA:600973), is currently the largest scale, most diversified and most influential leading company in domestic cable industry also first domestic 500kV high-voltage cable provider, Baosheng High-Voltage Cables Co., Ltd concentrates on the development, production and sales of high-voltage and ultra-high-voltage cables.
acf.advantage:
• Top 10 of the World’s cable & wire manufacturer One of the Fortune 500 Companies in 
  • China for 8 consecutive years 6500 employees 
  • Cable & Wires: 220 kinds with 23000 specifications 
  • Total subsidiaries: 10 
  • Occupies 200’000 square meter facility
  •  ISO9001, ISO14001, ISO10012 and “UL”, “3 C”, “classification society”, “coal mine safety Mark”
  • Awarded more than 300 provincial scientific and technological achievements
  • 40 projects were listed in the national torch, spark plan and high-tech innovation projects
  • 50 products was rated as national new products – 105 products won the national patent technology

ABB is a pioneering technology leader that works closely with utility, industry, infrastructure, power and mining customers in roughly 100 countries. With more than four decades at the forefront of digital, automation and power grid, electrification technologies, ABB is a leader in digitally connected and enabled electrical equipment in the world. ABB offers their product with best innovative, highest efficient, global leading quality since their establishment.

Focused businesses:

  • Power Grids 
  • Electrification 
  • Industrial Automation 
  • Robotics & Discrete Automation
